item.title: Solana On-chain Meme Coin nub Surges Over 38% in 24 Hours, Market Cap Now at $48 Million
item.description: On August 13th, according to GMGN data, the Solana-based Meme coin nub saw a surge of over 38% in the past 24 hours. It currently has a market cap of $48 million and a 24-hour trading volume of $7 million.nubcat (with the token symbol: nub) is derived from the quirky cat character created by artist Leon Karssen more than thirteen years ago. Karssen is a Dutch artist renowned for his humorous hand-drawn style and illustration work related to skateboarding culture. He participates in daily drawing activities, and the community focuses on a playful atmosphere.BlockBeats reminds users that Meme coins often lack practical use cases and experience high price volatility, and investment should be approached with caution.

item.title: Wang Feng: Cryptographic Assets Such as Bitcoin and Ethereum Will Become Anchors for Fundraising by Funds and Institutions
item.description: On August 13th, Wang Feng, the founder of LightHash, mentioned in a post that cryptocurrency is having a profound impact on the financial industry, encompassing banks, asset management companies, and VCs. It is not merely about retail investors holding assets such as Ethereum; rather, it is about a structural consensus taking shape in the financial market. Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, and perhaps even XRP are likely to become the anchor assets for many funds and institutional fundraising. Traditional fund managers and General Partners (GPs) are currently altering their viewpoints, and it is still not too late to actively engage.

item.title: Solana Ecosystem Meme Coins Experience Bull Run, FWOG Surges 33% in 24 Hours
item.description: On August 13th, based on market data, as SOL briefly exceeded $200, various meme coins in the Solana ecosystem generally experienced a price increase. These include:· FWOG rose by 33.4% in the past 24 hours and is now priced at $0.06585.· FARTCOIN increased by 26.1% in the past 24 hours and is now priced at $1.11.· BOME surged by 17.7% in the past 24 hours and is now priced at $0.00217.· WIF rose by 11.8% in the past 24 hours and is now priced at $1.031.· POPCAT went up by 11% in the past 24 hours and is now priced at $0.3437.· MEW increased by 10.9% in the past 24 hours and is now priced at $0.00346.· BONK rose by 8.8% in the past 24 hours and is now priced at $0.000027.

item.title: OKX USDT Easy Earn (Flexible Staking) APR Soars to 39%
item.description: On August 13th, according to OKX data, the annual percentage rate (APR) of OKX's USDT "Earn" (Flexible) product witnessed a surge to 39% within the past hour. Since last night, the rate has been fluctuating significantly within the range of 5% to 46%, and it reached a high of 46% around 5 a.m. today.It is reported that such rapid increases in the APR of OKX's flexible savings products usually take place during periods of high market volatility. Today, ETH continued to rise and exceeded the $4,600 mark, hitting a new high since 2022.

item.title: SOL Surges Past $200, Up 13.7% in the Last 24 Hours
item.description: On August 13th, based on HTX market data, SOL has surpassed $200 and is currently trading at $200.02, showing a 24-hour increase of 13.7%.

item.title: Binance will delist the ANIME/FDUSD, HYPER/FDUSD, and STO/BNB spot trading pairs.
item.description: According to official information, Binance will remove the ANIME/FDUSD, HYPER/FDUSD, and STO/BNB spot trading pairs from its platform on August 15, 2025, at 11:00 (UTC+8).

item.title: The cryptocurrency exchange platform Bullish is set to be listed on the NYSE today.
item.description: On August 13th, the cryptocurrency exchange platform Bullish, which is backed by billionaire Peter Thiel, is set to be listed on the NYSE on the same day under the stock symbol BLSH. According to the regulatory filing submitted by the company on August 4th, it plans to sell 20.3 million shares of stock at a price ranging from $28 to $31 per share, aiming to raise up to $629.3 million. Additionally, the underwriters have a 30-day option starting from the date of the prospectus to purchase an extra 3.045 million shares.On August 11th, Bullish enlarged the size of its initial public offering (IPO). It now aims for a valuation of up to $4.82 billion, which is a notable increase from last week's target of $4.2 billion. The new plan is to sell 30 million shares at a price between $32 and $33 per share. At the highest price, Bullish could raise approximately $990 million.Bullish was launched by Block.one (the blockchain company behind EOS) in 2020. BlackRock and Cathie Wood's ARK have alr

item.title: Bitcoin Dominance Drops Below 60%, Altcoin Market Cap Rises by 16.18% in the Past Week
item.description: On August 13th, based on market data, the dominance of Bitcoin (BTC.D) has decreased by 3.98% over the past week and currently stands at 59.32%.During the same period, the total cryptocurrency market capitalization has increased by 9.08% over the past week. The total market capitalization excluding Bitcoin (TOTAL 2) has risen by 16.18%, and the total market capitalization excluding Bitcoin and Ethereum (TOTAL 3) has increased by 10.52%.

item.title: Yesterday's net inflow into the US Bitcoin Spot ETF was $65.9 million
item.description: On August 13th, according to Farside's monitoring, the net inflow into the US Bitcoin spot ETF yesterday was $65.9 million.

item.title: Santiment: Ethereum Retail Traders Continue to Sell Off During ETH Price Surge
item.description: On August 13th, the cryptocurrency market analysis firm Santiment declared that "Ethereum is currently merely 6.4% away from its historical high of $4,891 on November 16, 2021. During Ethereum's upward movement, retail traders have been constantly offloading. "In history, price trends often go against the expectations of retail traders. On June 16, 2025, and July 30, extreme greed sentiment emerged, resulting in price corrections. Nevertheless, as the asset price continuously reaches new highs, traders have exhibited panic (FUD) and doubts.Currently, major stakeholders are accumulating Ethereum chips that retail traders are willing to sell, and the price shows almost no resistance from market sentiment, suggesting that Ethereum is likely to break through soon and set a new all-time high.
